content: For the second quarter of 2022, we delivered net sales growth of 35% year-over-year to $396.3 million with strong and broad-based growth in both our residential and commercial segments. Our second half revenue growth rate was approximately 40% year-over-year in the residential segment and included strong organic growth combined with approximately $60 million of inventory replenishment during the period, which we begin lapping this third quarter.
